name: DigiBoo - Sam
description:
DigiBoo is a digital game that is inspired by Cranium Cariboo.

The Children you work with will love it!

DigiBoo is perfect for teletherapy, it's an online game, and requires no extra app to open!

You can play it using your Desktop, Laptop, iPad, Tablet, Phone or even Echo Show's browser.

This Free DigiBoo is a Verb/Action Cards Deck, In addition to targeting the 15 verbs, this Deck could also be used to target the "he" pronoun or even Wh questions.

Unlike the regular Cariboo, no treasure box opens once children place all 6 balls in their place, in DigiBoo, children get to play a game in which they feed Sam some food.
